block.p: HEARTLAND INDUSTRIAL PARTNERS, Detroit, named Cynthia Hess a partner. She had been a vice president at DaimlerChrysler.
KLEINER PERKINS CAUFIELD & BYERS, Menlo Park, Calif., a venture capital firm, named Thomas Jermoluk general partner. He had been chairman of At Home, and remains a board member there.
HEARTLAND INDUSTRIAL PARTNERS, Detroit, named Cynthia Hess a partner. She had been a vice president at DaimlerChrysler.
KLEINER PERKINS CAUFIELD & BYERS, Menlo Park, Calif., a venture capital firm, named Thomas Jermoluk general partner. He had been chairman of At Home, and remains a board member there.
STAN LEE MEDIA, Los Angeles, named the actor George Hamilton president of its new global branded entertainment division.
SUNOCO, Philadelphia, named John G. Drosdick, president and chief operating officer, to the post of chairman and chief executive. Mr. Drosdick succeeds Robert H. Campbell, who is retiring.
